name: DataON Repository
description: DataON is Korea's National Research Data Platform. It provides integrated search of metadata for KISTI's research data and domestic and international research data and links to raw data. DataON allows users (researchers, policy makers, etc.) to perform the following tasks: Easily search for various types of research data in all scientific fields. By registering research results, research data can be posted and cited. Build a community among researchers and enable collaborative research. It provides a data analysis environment that allows one-stop analysis of discovered research data.
